en: Narrator: Peppa and her family are visiting Uncle Pig and Auntie Pig and Cousin Chloé.
cn: 旁白：佩奇一家正在拜访猪叔叔、猪阿姨和表姐克洛伊。

en: Daddy Pig: I expect Uncle Pig will fall asleep after lunch like he always does.
cn: 猪爸爸：我猜猪叔叔午饭后又会像往常一样睡着。

sentence.en: I expect Uncle Pig will fall asleep after lunch like he always does.
sentence.cn: 我猜猪叔叔午饭后又会像往常一样睡着。

examples.en: I expect it will rain tomorrow like it always does.
examples.cn: 我猜明天又会像往常一样下雨。

examples.en: I expect she will be late like she always is.
examples.cn: 我猜她又会像往常一样迟到。

en: Mummy Pig: Daddy Pig, you shouldn’t say such things about your own brother, especially in front of the children.
cn: 猪妈妈：猪爸爸，你不该在孩子们面前说你哥哥的坏话。

en: Daddy Pig: But it’s true. Uncle Pig always eats too much lunch and falls asleep, snoring loudly like this.
cn: 猪爸爸：可这是真的。猪叔叔总是吃太多午饭，然后睡着，还打呼噜，就像这样。

en: Daddy Pig: Uh, Peppa, George, forget what I just said about Uncle Pig.
cn: 猪爸爸：呃，佩奇，乔治，把我刚才说猪叔叔的话忘了吧。

sentence.en: Forget what I just said about Uncle Pig.
sentence.cn: 把我刚才说猪叔叔的话忘了吧。

examples.en: Forget what I just said about the weather.
examples.cn: 把我刚才说天气的话忘了吧。

examples.en: Forget what I just said about the game.
examples.cn: 把我刚才说游戏的话忘了吧。

en: Peppa Pig: OK, Daddy.
cn: 小猪佩奇：好的，爸爸。

en: Narrator: Peppa and her family have arrived at Uncle Pig and Auntie Pig’s house.
cn: 旁白：佩奇一家到达了猪叔叔和猪阿姨家。

en: Peppa Pig: Hello, Uncle Pig and Auntie Pig.
cn: 小猪佩奇：你好，猪叔叔，猪阿姨。

en: Auntie Pig: Hello.
cn: 猪阿姨：你好。

en: Uncle Pig: Hello, everyone.
cn: 猪叔叔：大家好。

en: Daddy Pig: Hello, big brother.
cn: 猪爸爸：你好，哥哥。

en: Narrator: Uncle Pig is Daddy Pig’s brother.
cn: 旁白：猪叔叔是猪爸爸的哥哥。

en: Narrator: Chloé Pig is Peppa and George’s cousin.
cn: 旁白：克洛伊是佩奇和乔治的表姐。

en: Peppa Pig: Hello, Chloé.
cn: 小猪佩奇：你好，克洛伊。

en: Chloé Pig: Hello, Peppa. Hello, George. I want to show you something.
cn: 克洛伊：你好，佩奇。你好，乔治。我想给你们看点东西。

points.en: I want to show you something.

en: Peppa Pig: Wait for us.
cn: 小猪佩奇：等等我们。

en: Chloé Pig: This is my new puppet theatre. My daddy made it for me.
cn: 克洛伊：这是我的新木偶剧场，是我爸爸给我做的。

en: Peppa Pig: Wow!
cn: 小猪佩奇：哇！

en: Chloé Pig: I’ve made two puppets already. This one is called Chloé.
cn: 克洛伊：我已经做了两个木偶，这个叫克洛伊。

examples.en: I've made a cake already.
I've read the book already.

en: Chloé Pig: (as puppet Chloé): Hello, I am Chloé Pig.
cn: 克洛伊（扮木偶）：你好，我是克洛伊猪。

en: Chloé Pig: And this one is my daddy.
cn: 克洛伊：这个是我爸爸。

en: Peppa Pig: Uncle Pig.
cn: 小猪佩奇：猪叔叔。

en: Chloé Pig: (as puppet Uncle Pig) Hello, Peppa. I am Uncle Pig.
cn: 克洛伊（扮木偶）：你好，佩奇，我是猪叔叔。

en: Peppa Pig: Chloé, can me and George make puppets too?
cn: 小猪佩奇：克洛伊，我和乔治也能做木偶吗？

en: Chloé Pig: Yes.
cn: 克洛伊：可以。

en: Narrator: Chloé paints the puppet's eyes.
cn: 旁白：克洛伊在给木偶画眼睛。

en: Peppa Pig: Can I do the mouth?
cn: 小猪佩奇：我能画嘴巴吗？

en: Chloé Pig: OK.
cn: 克洛伊：可以。

en: Peppa Pig: (as puppet Peppa Pig) My name is Peppa.
cn: 小猪佩奇（扮木偶）：我叫佩奇。

en: Chloé Pig: George, what puppet would you like to make?
cn: 克洛伊：乔治，你想做什么木偶？

sentence.en: What puppet would you like to make?

examples.en: What cake would you like to eat?
What game would you like to play?

en: George: Dinosaur.
cn: 乔治：恐龙。

en: Chloé Pig: A dinosaur?
cn: 克洛伊：恐龙？

en: Peppa Pig: George always says dinosaur for everything.
cn: 小猪佩奇：乔治什么都说恐龙。

en: Chloé Pig: OK, a scary dinosaur puppet.
cn: 克洛伊：好吧，一个可怕的恐龙木偶。

en: Narrator: Chloé is making George a dinosaur puppet.
cn: 旁白：克洛伊正在给乔治做恐龙木偶。

sentence.en: Chloé is making George a dinosaur puppet.
sentence.cn: 克洛伊正在给乔治做恐龙木偶。

examples.en: John is making a cake for his mum.
examples.cn: 约翰正在给他妈妈做蛋糕。

examples.en: Lucy is making a card for her friend.
examples.cn: 露西正在给她的朋友做卡片。

en: Chloé Pig: It needs pointy teeth. There, a scary dinosaur.
cn: 克洛伊：要有尖牙。好了，一个可怕的恐龙。

en: George: Grrr.
cn: 乔治：嗷。

en: Auntie Pig: Lunchtime, everyone.
cn: 猪阿姨：大家吃午饭啦。

en: Chloé Pig: Coming.
cn: 克洛伊：来了。

en: Chloé Pig: After lunch we’ll do a puppet show.
cn: 克洛伊：午饭后我们来表演木偶剧。

en: Peppa Pig: Hurrah!
cn: 小猪佩奇：万岁！

en: Narrator: Auntie Pig has made spaghetti for lunch.
cn: 旁白：猪阿姨做了意大利面当午饭。

sentence.en: Auntie Pig has made spaghetti for lunch.
sentence.cn: 猪阿姨做了意大利面当午饭。

examples.en: Mummy Pig has made a cake for dessert.
examples.cn: 猪妈妈做了蛋糕当甜点。

examples.en: Daddy Pig has made sandwiches for the picnic.
examples.cn: 猪爸爸做了三明治当野餐食物。

en: Daddy Pig: This spaghetti is delicious.
cn: 猪爸爸：这意大利面真好吃。

en: Uncle Pig: Best spaghetti ever.
cn: 猪叔叔：这是我吃过最好吃的意大利面。

sentence.cn: 这是我吃过最好吃的意大利面。

examples.en: Best cake ever.
examples.cn: 这是我吃过最好吃的蛋糕。

examples.en: Best game ever.
examples.cn: 这是我玩过最好玩的游戏。

en: Mummy Pig: You can tell you two are brothers.
cn: 猪妈妈：一看你们俩就是兄弟。

sentence.en: You can tell you two are brothers.

examples.en: You can tell they are sisters.
You can tell they are friends.

en: Auntie Pig: Alike in every way.
cn: 猪阿姨：各方面都很像。

en: Daddy Pig: What do you mean?
cn: 猪爸爸：什么意思？

en: Uncle Pig: We are completely different.
cn: 猪叔叔：我们完全不一样。

en: Chloé Pig: Peppa, George and I are going to do a puppet show.
cn: 克洛伊：佩奇、乔治和我要表演木偶剧。

en: Auntie Pig: Fantastic! Call us when you’re ready.
cn: 猪阿姨：太棒了，准备好就叫我们。

examples.en: Call me when you’re home.
Call us when you arrive.

en: Peppa Pig: See you later.
cn: 小猪佩奇：待会见。

en: Daddy Pig: A puppet show? That sounds fun. Have I got time for some more spaghetti?
cn: 猪爸爸：木偶剧？听起来很有趣。我还有时间再吃点意大利面吗？

sentence.en: Have I got time for some more spaghetti?
sentence.cn: 我还有时间再吃点意大利面吗？

examples.en: Have I got time for a quick nap?
examples.cn: 我还有时间小睡一会儿吗？

examples.en: Have I got time for a shower?

en: Uncle Pig: Could I have some more too?
cn: 猪叔叔：我也能再来点吗？

sentence.en: Could I have some more too?

examples.en: Could I have some more juice?
Could I have some more cake?

en: Narrator: The puppet show is about to begin.
cn: 旁白：木偶剧马上要开始了。

sentence.en: The puppet show is about to begin.

examples.en: The concert is about to begin.
The movie is about to begin.

en: Chloé Pig: (as puppet Chloé) Hello, my name is Chloé.
cn: 克洛伊（扮木偶）：你好，我叫克洛伊。

en: Peppa Pig: (as puppet Peppa) And I am Peppa.
cn: 小猪佩奇（扮木偶）：我是佩奇。

en: George: (as puppet dinosaur) Grrr.
cn: 乔治（扮木偶）：嗷。

en: Peppa Pig: (as puppet Peppa) It’s a dinosaur!
cn: 小猪佩奇（扮木偶）：是恐龙！

en: Chloé Pig: (as puppet Chloé) Scary dinosaur. Eek!
cn: 克洛伊（扮木偶）：可怕的恐龙。哎呀！

en: Auntie Pig: I say, that’s very good.
cn: 猪阿姨：我说，这真棒。

en: Daddy Pig: Bravo!
cn: 猪爸爸：太棒了！

en: Chloé Pig: (as puppet Uncle Pig) I am Uncle Pig.
cn: 克洛伊（扮木偶）：我是猪叔叔。

en: Peppa Pig: (as puppet Peppa) Hello, Uncle Pig.
cn: 小猪佩奇（扮木偶）：你好，猪叔叔。

en: Chloé Pig: (as puppet Uncle Pig) Hello, Peppa. Ho, ho, ho.
cn: 克洛伊（扮木偶）：你好，佩奇。呵呵呵。

en: Auntie Pig: It looks just like you.
cn: 猪阿姨：看起来和你一模一样。

examples.en: This painting looks just like the real thing.
examples.cn: 这幅画看起来和真品一模一样。

examples.en: This toy looks just like a real car.
examples.cn: 这个玩具看起来和真车一模一样。

en: Uncle Pig: I think they’ve made my tummy a bit big.
cn: 猪叔叔：我觉得他们把我的肚子画大了。

points.en: made my tummy a bit big

en: Chloé Pig: (as puppet Uncle Pig) Ho, ho, I did enjoy my lunch.
cn: 克洛伊（扮木偶）：呵呵，我很喜欢午饭。

examples.en: I did enjoy the movie.
I did enjoy the party.

en: Peppa Pig: (as puppet Peppa) Uncle Pig, are you going to fall asleep and snore like you always do?
cn: 小猪佩奇（扮木偶）：猪叔叔，你是不是又要像平时那样睡着打呼噜？

en: Chloé Pig: (as puppet Uncle Pig) What do you mean?
cn: 克洛伊（扮木偶）：什么意思？

en: Peppa Pig: (as puppet Peppa) Daddy says you always fall asleep and snore loudly like this.
cn: 小猪佩奇（扮木偶）：爸爸说你总是睡着，还打很大的呼噜。

en: Chloé Pig: (as puppet Uncle Pig) Ho, ho, your daddy’s right. I do snore like this.
cn: 克洛伊（扮木偶）：呵呵，你爸爸说得对，我就是这样打呼噜的。

examples.en: I do like ice cream.
I do enjoy reading.

en: Mummy Pig: Daddy Pig, you shouldn’t have said those things about Uncle Pig.
cn: 猪妈妈：猪爸爸，你不该说猪叔叔的坏话。

sentence.en: You shouldn’t have said those things about Uncle Pig.
sentence.cn: 你不该说猪叔叔的坏话。

examples.en: You shouldn’t have eaten my lunch.
You shouldn’t have gone there.

en: Auntie Pig: I don’t think Daddy Pig or Uncle Pig can hear you.
cn: 猪阿姨：我觉得猪爸爸和猪叔叔都听不到你说话了。

sentence.en: I don’t think Daddy Pig or Uncle Pig can hear you.
sentence.cn: 我觉得猪爸爸和猪叔叔都听不到你说话了。

examples.en: I don’t think he can see us.
I don’t think they will come.

en: Narrator: Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig have fallen asleep.
cn: 旁白：猪爸爸和猪叔叔都睡着了。

en: Mummy Pig: You can tell they’re brothers.
cn: 猪妈妈：一看就知道他们是兄弟。

en: Uncle Pig: What happened?
cn: 猪叔叔：发生什么了？

en: Daddy Pig: Has the puppet show started yet?
cn: 猪爸爸：木偶剧开始了吗？

sentence.en: Has the puppet show started yet?

examples.en: Has the meeting started yet?
Has the movie started yet?
